input.sentences: today was my day to do my presentation at college .
i think i did a great job !
the rest of the class was taking notes while i was speaking
they would then be tested on what i presented
finally.. the end of my presentation . i got an a
output.sentences: Day one of college is presentation day
This is the normal job for a college student
Each student needs to make sure they rest between taking questions and speaking
After the presentation there is always a quick test
There is many presentation each day
